name: rabex2
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, universe))

stmt.origin: rabexd(s0, c0, c1, universe, wcel(c1, universe), w0)
stmt.pretty: rabexd(s0, c0, c1, universe, c1 ∈ 𝕌, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, universe))
-| wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0))
-| wi(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0))
-| wi(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

|- wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

comment: Separation Scheme in terms of a restricted class abstraction. (Contributed by AV, 16-Jul-2019.) (Revised by AV, 26-Mar-2021.)
